about_the_game:
Welcome to Pug and Seek: an exciting hide-and-seek game where the action never ends! Choose your side in this thrilling challenge: will you be the formidable MrJackx or one of the cunning pugs?

Game Modes:

MrJackx: Play as MrJackx, a tireless streamer who will stop at nothing to catch all the mischievous pugs. Use your wits and skills to explore the maze-like map, find the most unlikely hiding spots, and surprise the pugs. Only the fastest and most strategic will manage to catch them all!

Pugs: In this mode, you are a pug trying to escape the relentless wrath of MrJackx. Run, hide, and use every corner of the map to avoid being caught. Your speed and adaptability will be your best weapons to survive until time runs out.

Key Features:

Online Multiplayer Game: Challenge your friends or MrJackx himself in multiplayer matches. Who will be the best at hiding or catching?

Special Abilities: Use special abilities that will give you the decisive advantage, whether you are seeking or escaping.

Choose your side, hone your skills, and dive into the adventure of Pug and Seek! Join the challenge and prove who the real master of hide-and-seek is!

short_description: Pug and Seek is a hide-and-seek game: clever pugs run, hide, and cause chaos, while Jack, the unstoppable streamer, must find, catch, and return them to the pen. Challenge friends online and prove who is the master of hide-and-seek!
